analyzed: ▁pathavī dhātu sa nidassan ā tiādi kathā

original: Rūpaṁ rūpāyatanaṁ rūpadhātu nīlaṁ pītakaṁ lohitakaṁ odātaṁ cakkhuviññeyyaṁ cakkhusmiṁ paṭihaññati cakkhussa āpāthaṁ āgacchatīti?
analyzed: ▁rūpaṃ ▁rūpāyatanaṃ ▁rūp adhātu ▁nīl aṃ ▁ pīt akaṃ ▁lohita kaṃ ▁odāt aṃ ▁cakkhu viññeyy aṃ ▁cakkhu smiṃ ▁paṭi haññ ati ▁cakkhu ssa ▁āpāth aṃ ▁āgaccha tīti

original: Hañci “cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇan”ti—
attheva suttanto, no ca vata re vattabbe—
Hañci passati bhūmiṁ pāsāṇaṁ pabbataṁ, tena vata re vattabbe—
Hañci passati udakaṁ, tena vata re vattabbe—
Hañci passati aggiṁ jalantaṁ, tena vata re vattabbe—

analyzed: ▁nanu ▁passati ▁vā t ena ▁rukkh e ▁sa ñc ā l iyamāne ti
